amendment.description: To make all Medicare beneficiaries eligible for Medicare prescription drug coverage.

vote.text: Amendment SA 975 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 47 - 51. Record Vote Number: 257.

action.text: Amendment SA 975 proposed by Senator Rockefeller. (consideration: CR S8324-8325; text: CR S8325) To make all Medicare beneficiaries eligible for Medicare prescription drug coverage.
